name: Project Custom Gunner
description:
This game project is a fast paced 4-player arcade-like multiplayer arena shooter where the objective is to defeat the other opponents utilizing a wide range of customizable weapons and other options. Its heavily based on games such as Custom Robo, Armored Core, and Power Stone.

This project was originally a test for me in learning Unreal Engine but since then has grown to a full project the more time I spent working on it. Still very much a work in progress and still have a ton of placeholder assets lying within but over time I'll iron those out as I continue building on it.

------------------------
